passive.name: A Knight's Pilgrimage
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate based on their Max Energy. Each point of Energy increases DMG dealt by Ultimate by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 2)}}%</orangeStrong>. A max of {{3}} points of Energy will be taken into account for this.
